name: The Holy Sword
description:
In the holy sword, you can't actually hurt the enemy player. Your goal is to heal up your shrine through prayer. Your opponent will be trying to destroy your shrine by completing rituals. 

Made for Ludum Dare 46 in 48 hours.

--- Player 1 Controls ---

A / D Keys - Left and right movement

S Key - Parry

W Key - Pray

F Key - Attack

--- Player 2 Controls ---

J / L Keys - Left and right movement

K Key - Parry

I Key - Pray

H Key - Attack
